pullrequest.title: Disable tests compilation by default. New 'make tests' target.

content.raw:
When is this message supposed to show up? Running `cmake .. -DENABLE_TESTS_COMPILATION=false` gives me different errors, and `cmake .. -DENABLE_TESTS_COMPILATION=true` goes through without messages.

Also, grepping for it I can see several instances still being used, should we remove them? Or is the intent to deprecate it for one version and only remove it completely on gazebo9?
content.html:
When is this message supposed to show up? Running cmake .. -DENABLE_TESTS_COMPILATION=false gives me different errors, and cmake .. -DENABLE_TESTS_COMPILATION=true goes through without messages.

Also, grepping for it I can see several instances still being used, should we remove them? Or is the intent to deprecate it for one version and only remove it completely on gazebo9?
